Airtame (https://airtame.com) | Copenhagen, Denmark | Full-time, Onsite | Frontend engineer

Airtame is an early-stage startup in the heart of Copenhagen. Our wireless streaming solution helps people work better.

As a frontend engineer, you'll be an essential part of the team which develops our web applications, from our cloud-based device management system, to our cross-platform desktop application and main website.

We're big fans of ES6, React and Redux. We value rapid iteration, continuous integration and automated testing, and we are serious about producing high-quality, maintainable software. Frequent code reviews, linting, and pairing are all integral components of our engineering culture.

If you're passionate about building simple, yet powerful and beautiful user interfaces, send an email to tech-jobs@airtame.com

We can sponsor work visas for non-EU applicants.
